verses.verse: Moreover the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,
And thou<WH1121>, son of man<WH120>, wilt thou judge<WH8199>, wilt thou judge<WH8199> the bloody<WH1818> city<WH5892>? then cause her to know<WH3045> all her abominations<WH8441>.

And thou shalt say<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>: A city<WH5892> that sheddeth<WH8210> blood<WH1818> in the midst<WH8432> of her<WH6256>, that her time may come<WH935>, and that maketh<WH6213> idols<WH1544> against herself to defile her<WH2930>!

Thou art become guilty<WH816> in thy blood<WH1818> that thou hast shed<WH8210>, and art defiled<WH2930> in thine idols<WH1544> which thou hast made<WH6213>; and thou hast caused thy days<WH3117> to draw near<WH7126>, and art come<WH935> even unto thy years<WH8141>: therefore have I made<WH5414> thee a reproach<WH2781> unto the nations<WH1471>, and a mocking<WH7048> to all the countries<WH776>.
Those that are near<WH7138>, and those that are far<WH7350> from thee<WH7046>, shall mock thee<WH2931>, thou infamous one and full<WH7227> of tumult<WH4103>.
Behold <WH5387>, the princes of Israel<WH3478>, every one<WH376> according to his power<WH2220>, have been in thee to shed<WH8210> blood<WH1818>.

In thee have they set light<WH7043> by father<WH1> and mother<WH517>; in the midst<WH8432> of thee have they dealt<WH6213> by oppression<WH6233> with the sojourner<WH1616>; in thee have they wronged<WH3238> the fatherless<WH3490> and the widow<WH490>.
Thou hast despised<WH959> my holy things<WH6944>, and hast profaned<WH2490> my sabbaths<WH7676>.

Slanderous <WH7400> men<WH582> have been in thee to shed<WH8210> blood<WH1818>; and in thee they have eaten<WH398> upon the mountains<WH2022>: in the midst<WH8432> of thee they have committed<WH6213> lewdness<WH2154>.
In thee have they uncovered<WH1540> their fathers<WH1>' nakedness<WH6172>; in thee have they humbled<WH6031> her that was unclean<WH5079> in her impurity<WH2931>.

And one<WH376> hath committed<WH6213> abomination<WH8441> with his neighbor<WH7453>'s wife<WH802>; and another<WH376> hath lewdly<WH2154> defiled<WH2930> his daughter-in<WH3618>-law; and another<WH376> in thee hath humbled<WH6031> his sister<WH269>, his father<WH1>'s daughter<WH1323>.

In thee have they taken<WH3947> bribes<WH7810> to shed<WH8210> blood<WH1818>; thou hast taken<WH3947> interest<WH5392> and increase<WH8636>, and thou hast greedily gained<WH1214> of thy neighbors<WH7453> by oppression<WH6233>, and hast forgotten<WH7911> me<WH5002>, saith the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.
Behold <WH5221>, therefore, I have smitten my hand<WH3709> at thy dishonest gain<WH1215> which thou hast made<WH6213>, and at thy blood<WH1818> which hath been in the midst of thee<WH8432>.

Can thy heart<WH3820> endure<WH5975>, or can thy hands<WH3027> be strong<WH2388>, in the days<WH3117> that I shall deal<WH6213> with thee<WH3068>? I, Jehovah, have spoken<WH1696> it<WH6213>, and will do it.
And I will scatter<WH6327> thee among the nations<WH1471>, and disperse<WH2219> thee through the countries<WH776>; and I will consume<WH8552> thy filthiness out of thee<WH2932>.
And thou shalt be profaned<WH2490> in thyself<WH5869>, in the sight of the nations<WH1471>; and thou shalt know<WH3045> that I am Jehovah<WH3068>.
And the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man<WH120>, the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> is become dross<WH5509> unto me<WH5178>: all of them are brass and tin<WH913> and iron<WH1270> and lead<WH5777>, in the midst<WH8432> of the furnace<WH3564>; they are the dross<WH5509> of silver<WH3701>.
Therefore thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>: Because ye are all become dross<WH5509>, therefore<WH6908>, behold, I will gather you into the midst<WH8432> of Jerusalem<WH3389>.

As they gather<WH6910> silver<WH3701> and brass<WH5178> and iron<WH1270> and lead<WH5777> and tin<WH913> into the midst<WH8432> of the furnace<WH3564>, to blow<WH5301> the fire<WH784> upon it<WH5413>, to melt it<WH6908>; so will I gather you in mine anger<WH639> and in my wrath<WH2534>, and I will lay<WH3240> you there<WH5413>, and melt you.
Yea <WH3664>, I will gather you<WH5301>, and blow upon you with the fire<WH784> of my wrath<WH5678>, and ye shall be melted<WH5413> in the midst thereof<WH8432>.

As silver<WH3701> is melted<WH2046> in the midst<WH8432> of the furnace<WH3564>, so shall ye be melted<WH5413> in the midst<WH8432> thereof<WH3045>; and ye shall know that I<WH3068>, Jehovah, have poured out<WH8210> my wrath upon you<WH2534>.
And the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> came unto me<WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man<WH120>, say<WH559> unto her<WH776>, Thou art a land that is not cleansed<WH2891>, nor rained<WH1656> upon in the day<WH3117> of indignation<WH2195>.

There is a conspiracy<WH7195> of her prophets<WH5030> in the midst<WH8432> thereof<WH7580>, like a roaring lion<WH738> ravening<WH2963> the prey<WH2964>: they have devoured<WH398> souls<WH5315>; they take<WH3947> treasure<WH2633> and precious things<WH3366>; they have made her widows<WH490> many<WH7235> in the midst thereof<WH8432>.

Her priests<WH3548> have done violence<WH2554> to my law<WH8451>, and have profaned<WH2490> my holy things<WH6944>: they have made no distinction<WH914> between the holy<WH6944> and the common<WH2455>, neither have they caused men to discern<WH3045> between the unclean<WH2931> and the clean<WH2889>, and have hid<WH5956> their eyes<WH5869> from my sabbaths<WH7676>, and I am profaned<WH2490> among them<WH8432>.

Her princes<WH8269> in the midst<WH7130> thereof are like wolves<WH2061> ravening<WH2963> the prey<WH2964>, to shed<WH8210> blood<WH1818>, and to destroy<WH6> souls<WH5315>, that they may get<WH1214> dishonest gain<WH1215>.

And her prophets<WH5030> have daubed<WH2902> for them with untempered<WH8602> mortar<WH2374>, seeing false<WH7723> visions<WH7080>, and divining lies<WH3577> unto them<WH559>, saying, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3068>, when Jehovah<WH3068> hath not spoken<WH1696>.

The people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> have used oppression<WH6231>, and exercised<WH1497> robbery<WH1498>; yea<WH3238>, they have vexed the poor<WH6041> and needy<WH34>, and have oppressed<WH6231> the sojourner<WH1616> wrongfully<WH4941>.

And I sought<WH1245> for a man<WH376> among them<WH1443>, that should build up the wall<WH1447>, and stand<WH5975> in the gap<WH6556> before<WH6440> me for the land<WH776>, that I should not destroy<WH7843> it<WH4672>; but I found none.

Therefore have I poured out<WH8210> mine indignation<WH2195> upon them<WH3615>; I have consumed them with the fire<WH784> of my wrath<WH5678>: their own way<WH1870> have I brought<WH5414> upon their heads<WH7218>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH3069>.
